VOUCHER_TABLE_EMPTY_NO_MATCHES: No vouchers match that search criteria.
VOUCHER_ACTIONS_BATCH_REVOKE_CONFIRM_MES: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to revoke 1 voucher?} other {Are you sure you want to revoke # vouchers?}}
VOUCHER_ACTIONS_BATCH_REVOKE_SUCCESS: {count, plural, one {1 voucher have been removed.} other {# vouchers have been removed.}}
VOUCHER_ACTIONS_BATCH_REVOKE_ERROR: There was an error removing vouchers.
VOUCHER_ACTIONS_PRINT_ERROR: There was an error printing vouchers.
VOUCHER_ACTIONS_REVOKE_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to revoke voucher {{code}}?
VOUCHER_ACTIONS_REVOKE_ERROR: There was an error removing the voucher {{code}}.
VOUCHER_ACTIONS_CREATE_ERROR: There was an error creating vouchers.
VOUCHER_CREATE_TOOLTIP_BYTE_QUOTA: Byte Quota is per use. If you have chosen multi-use, a total data will be multiplied by the number of uses.
VOUCHER_CREATE_INPUT_FEEDBACK_COUNT: "Count" has to be a number between 1 to 10000
VOUCHER_CREATE_INPUT_FEEDBACK_EXPIRATION: "Expiration Value" has to be a number between 1 to 1000000
VOUCHER_CREATE_INPUT_FEEDBACK_DOWNLOAD: "Download Limit" has to be a value between 2 to 100000 Kbps
VOUCHER_CREATE_INPUT_FEEDBACK_UPLOAD: "Upload Limit" has to be a value between 2 to 100000 Kbps
VOUCHER_CREATE_INPUT_FEEDBACK_BYTE_QUOTA: "Byte Quota" has to be a value between 1 to 1048576 MB
